===Used in=== {|class="wikitable" |- | This berry is used in |- | Berry 1 |- | Berry 2 |} {|class="wikitable" |- | Test |- | [[File:Bulbasaur_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] |- | [[File:Ivysaur_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] |- | [[File:Venusaur_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] |- | [[File:Charmander_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] |- | [[File:Charmeleon_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] |- | [[File:Charizard_Egg_Pattern.png|30px]] |- | [[File:Grey Shard.png|79px]][[File:GreyShardMine.png]] |- | [[File:Purple Shard.png|79px]][[File:PurpleShardMine.png]] |} ====Bag Functions test==== {{Bag2|Lucky Incense|Lucky test ?}} <- Bag2 set the image link to the second argument, but seems like never used anywhere {{Bag3|EXP Share|EXP test ?}} <- Bag3 doesn't show anything if second argument, just the picture {{Bag4|Pokéball|Poké test ?}} <- Bag4 works perfectly ====Template test for translators==== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Parc Safari|Commun}}
